title: Man holding a banner
description: Phototgraphers' description: photos and video of Jan 29-Feb 11, 2011, Protests (downtown) & celebration in Maadi. Text in image: 30 Years of No Achievement! ارحل كفاية عايز أروح استحمه! . Translation of Text in image: Enough, Leave, I want to go take a shower!
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
